original_text: For when David was in Edom, and Joab the commander of the army went up to bury the slain, he struck down every male in Edom
korean_text: 전에 다윗이 에돔에 있을 때에 군대 지휘관 요압이 가서 죽임을 당한 자들을 장사하고 에돔의 남자를 다 쳐서 죽였는데

sentences.original_text: For when David was in Edom
and Joab the commander of the army went up
he struck down every male in Edom
